member.name: T:joseki.db.entities.AuditEntity
member.summary: The entity represents a single Audit object.

member.name: P:joseki.db.entities.AuditEntity.AuditId
member.summary: External audit identifier.

member.name: P:joseki.db.entities.AuditEntity.Date
member.summary: date when audit was performed.

member.name: P:joseki.db.entities.AuditEntity.ComponentId
member.summary: Which infrastructure component was audited: k8s-cluster id or azure-subscription-id.

member.name: P:joseki.db.entities.AuditEntity.InfrastructureComponent
member.summary: Reference to related infrastructure component.

member.name: P:joseki.db.entities.AuditEntity.CheckResults
member.summary: List of all check-results, that belongs to the audit.

member.name: P:joseki.db.entities.AuditEntity.MetadataKube
member.summary: Reference to associated Kubernetes metadata. The property is null, if audit belongs to azure. Only one of MetadataAzure and MetadataKube is not null.

member.name: P:joseki.db.entities.AuditEntity.MetadataAzure
member.summary: Reference to associated Azure metadata. The property is null, if audit belongs to kubernetes. Only one of MetadataAzure and MetadataKube is not null.

member.name: T:joseki.db.entities.CheckEntity
member.summary: Describes in details a single check type.

member.name: P:joseki.db.entities.CheckEntity.CheckId
member.summary: The check identifier in form "{scanner-type}.{scanner-check-id}".

member.name: P:joseki.db.entities.CheckEntity.Category
member.summary: It groups related check types, for example "k8s.security", "azure.storage".

member.name: P:joseki.db.entities.CheckEntity.Severity
member.summary: The severity answers the question: how dangerous the failure of this check could be. It helps to prioritize check results.

member.name: P:joseki.db.entities.CheckEntity.Description
member.summary: Detailed check description: what exactly it verifies and why it's important.

member.name: P:joseki.db.entities.CheckEntity.Remediation
member.summary: The suggestion how to fix the issue.

member.name: T:joseki.db.entities.CheckSeverity
member.summary: Check severities.

member.name: F:joseki.db.entities.CheckSeverity.Unknown
member.summary: The level is unknown.

member.name: F:joseki.db.entities.CheckSeverity.Critical
member.summary: Top-level issues, that often should be addressed as soon as possible.

member.name: F:joseki.db.entities.CheckSeverity.High
member.summary: Important issue, which should be carefully reviewed.

member.name: F:joseki.db.entities.CheckSeverity.Medium
member.summary: Medium-level problem, which could cause moderate damage or loss.

member.name: F:joseki.db.entities.CheckSeverity.Low
member.summary: The lowest severity in the rank. Represents only a slight damage.

member.name: T:joseki.db.entities.CheckResultEntity
member.summary: A single check result object.

member.name: P:joseki.db.entities.CheckResultEntity.CheckId
member.summary: The reference to Check entity.

member.name: P:joseki.db.entities.CheckResultEntity.ComponentId
member.summary: Unique component identifier in format: - for azure components: `subscription/{id}/resource_group/{rg_name}/{object_type}/{object_name}`; - for k8s resources: `k8s/{cluster_id}/namespace/{ns_name}/{object_type}/{object_name}/pod/{pod_name}/container/{container_name}/{image_tag}`, where all sections after `{object_name}` are optional, as there might be separate checks on object-type, pod, container, or image.

member.name: P:joseki.db.entities.CheckResultEntity.AuditId
member.summary: The reference to Audit entity.

member.name: P:joseki.db.entities.CheckResultEntity.Value
member.summary: The check result itself.

member.name: P:joseki.db.entities.CheckResultEntity.Message
member.summary: Free-format associated message.

member.name: P:joseki.db.entities.CheckResultEntity.Audit
member.summary: Audit object.

member.name: P:joseki.db.entities.CheckResultEntity.Check
member.summary: Check object.

member.name: T:joseki.db.entities.CheckValue
member.summary: Represents the check result value.

member.name: F:joseki.db.entities.CheckValue.NoData
member.summary: There is no result due one of the reasons: - the check failed, - the check requires a manual step, - the check result should be verified by end-user.

member.name: F:joseki.db.entities.CheckValue.InProgress
member.summary: The check is still in progress

member.name: F:joseki.db.entities.CheckValue.Failed
member.summary: The Component failed to satisfy Check requirements.

member.name: F:joseki.db.entities.CheckValue.Succeeded
member.summary: The Component satisfied Check requirements.

member.name: T:joseki.db.entities.CveEntity
member.summary: The object describes a single CVE (Common Vulnerabilities and Exposures).

member.name: P:joseki.db.entities.CveEntity.CveId
member.summary: The CVE identifier, which looks like `CVE-2005-2541` or `TEMP-0290435-0B57B5`.

member.name: P:joseki.db.entities.CveEntity.Title
member.summary: Short CVE description.

member.name: P:joseki.db.entities.CveEntity.PackageName
member.summary: The name of the package, where CVE was found, for example "tar" or "sysvinit-utils".

member.name: P:joseki.db.entities.CveEntity.Description
member.summary: Detailed CVE description.

member.name: P:joseki.db.entities.CveEntity.Severity
member.summary: Highlights how dangerous the CVE is.

member.name: P:joseki.db.entities.CveEntity.Remediation
member.summary: In most cases, suggests to update the sources to the version of the package, that addresses the issue.

member.name: P:joseki.db.entities.CveEntity.References
member.summary: Links to external source with more details about the CVE.

member.name: T:joseki.db.entities.CveSeverity
member.summary: CVE severities.

member.name: F:joseki.db.entities.CveSeverity.Unknown
member.summary: The level is unknown.

member.name: F:joseki.db.entities.CveSeverity.Critical
member.summary: Top-level issues, that often should be addressed as soon as possible.

member.name: F:joseki.db.entities.CveSeverity.High
member.summary: Important issue, which should be carefully reviewed.

member.name: F:joseki.db.entities.CveSeverity.Medium
member.summary: Medium-level problem, which could cause moderate damage or loss.

member.name: F:joseki.db.entities.CveSeverity.Low
member.summary: The lowest severity in the rank. Represents only a slight damage.

member.name: T:joseki.db.entities.IJosekiBaseEntity
member.summary: The base interface for EF core entities.

member.name: P:joseki.db.entities.IJosekiBaseEntity.Id
member.summary: Auto-increment PK column.

member.name: P:joseki.db.entities.IJosekiBaseEntity.DateUpdated
member.summary: Set to current UTC time every time when the record is changed.

member.name: P:joseki.db.entities.IJosekiBaseEntity.DateCreated
member.summary: UTC time, when the record was created.

member.name: P:joseki.db.entities.IJosekiBaseEntity.ChangedBy
member.summary: Name of the actor who requested the record creation/change.

member.name: T:joseki.db.entities.ImageScanResultEntity
member.summary: The goal of image scan is verify if known CVEs (Common Vulnerabilities and Exposures) present in used by image packages. Therefore, the Scan Result consists of an array of CVEs. The array might be empty, if no vulnerabilities was found.

member.name: P:joseki.db.entities.ImageScanResultEntity.ExternalId
member.summary: Unique identifier.

member.name: P:joseki.db.entities.ImageScanResultEntity.ImageTag
member.summary: Full image tag, which includes registry, image name and version. For example `mcr.microsoft.com/dotnet/core/sdk:3.1.101-alpine3.10`.

member.name: P:joseki.db.entities.ImageScanResultEntity.Date
member.summary: UTC point of time when scan was performed.

member.name: P:joseki.db.entities.ImageScanResultEntity.Status
member.summary: The status of the Image Scan.

member.name: P:joseki.db.entities.ImageScanResultEntity.Description
member.summary: Human-readable description of the scan.

member.name: P:joseki.db.entities.ImageScanResultEntity.FoundCVEs
member.summary: List of discovered vulnerabilities.

member.name: T:joseki.db.entities.ImageScanStatus
member.summary: The status of the Image Scan.

member.name: F:joseki.db.entities.ImageScanStatus.Queued
member.summary: Image Scan was already queued, but the result is not handled yet.

member.name: F:joseki.db.entities.ImageScanStatus.Failed
member.summary: Image scanner failed to perform the scan.

member.name: F:joseki.db.entities.ImageScanStatus.Succeeded
member.summary: Image scan succeeded. This status does not mean, that the image passed the scan!

member.name: T:joseki.db.entities.ImageScanToCveEntity
member.summary: Maps exact image scans to list of CVEs in this scan.

member.name: P:joseki.db.entities.ImageScanToCveEntity.ScanId
member.summary: Image Scan Result identifier.

member.name: P:joseki.db.entities.ImageScanToCveEntity.CveId
member.summary: CVE identifier.

member.name: P:joseki.db.entities.ImageScanToCveEntity.Target
member.summary: Where the CVE was discovered: container image name or application dependencies file.

member.name: P:joseki.db.entities.ImageScanToCveEntity.UsedPackage
member.summary: The package that have CVE or depends on a package with CVE.

member.name: P:joseki.db.entities.ImageScanToCveEntity.UsedPackageVersion
member.summary: States which exact version of vulnerable package `ScanId` discovered.

member.name: P:joseki.db.entities.ImageScanToCveEntity.CVE
member.summary: Reference to associated CVE object.

member.name: P:joseki.db.entities.ImageScanToCveEntity.ImageScan
member.summary: Reference to Image Scan Result object.

member.name: T:joseki.db.entities.InfrastructureComponentEntity
member.summary: The entity represents Infrastructure Component object.

member.name: P:joseki.db.entities.InfrastructureComponentEntity.ScannerId
member.summary: Which scanner is responsible for auditing.

member.name: P:joseki.db.entities.InfrastructureComponentEntity.ComponentId
member.summary: External infrastructure component identifier: k8s-cluster id or azure-subscription-id.

member.name: P:joseki.db.entities.InfrastructureComponentEntity.ComponentName
member.summary: Human-friendly infrastructure component name.

member.name: T:joseki.db.entities.KnowledgebaseEntity
member.summary: The entity represents a single Knowledge-base item.

member.name: P:joseki.db.entities.KnowledgebaseEntity.ItemId
member.summary: External knowledge-base identifier. the id consist of a several sections separated with '/'.

member.name: P:joseki.db.entities.KnowledgebaseEntity.Content
member.summary: The knowledge-base item content.

member.name: T:joseki.db.entities.MetadataAzureEntity
member.summary: Json-serialized azure metadata, actual at a particular audit time.

member.name: P:joseki.db.entities.MetadataAzureEntity.AuditId
member.summary: Reference to the audit record.

member.name: P:joseki.db.entities.MetadataAzureEntity.Date
member.summary: Date and time, when metadata was collected.

member.name: P:joseki.db.entities.MetadataAzureEntity.JSON
member.summary: Json-encoded representation of azure-metadata.

member.name: P:joseki.db.entities.MetadataAzureEntity.Audit
member.summary: Reference to Audit row.

member.name: T:joseki.db.entities.MetadataKubeEntity
member.summary: Json-serialized kubernetes metadata, actual at a particular audit time.

member.name: P:joseki.db.entities.MetadataKubeEntity.Id
member.summary: The record identifier.

member.name: P:joseki.db.entities.MetadataKubeEntity.AuditId
member.summary: Reference to the audit record.

member.name: P:joseki.db.entities.MetadataKubeEntity.Date
member.summary: Date and time, when metadata was collected.

member.name: P:joseki.db.entities.MetadataKubeEntity.JSON
member.summary: Json-encoded representation of kube-metadata.

member.name: P:joseki.db.entities.MetadataKubeEntity.Audit
member.summary: Reference to Audit row.

member.name: P:joseki.db.JosekiDbContext.MetadataKube

member.summary: Image Scan Result to Cve table.

member.name: T:joseki.db.JosekiDbContext.JosekiDbContextFactory
member.summary: JosekiDbContextFactory used to update the database with the entity framework during design time (update-database).
